channel.title: Robotics on Zijian Hu
channel.description: Recent content in Robotics on Zijian Hu

item.title: Socially Aware, Expressive, and Personalized Mobile Remote Presence: Co-Robots as Gateways to Access to K-12 In-School Education
item.description: Providing different control interface for telepresence robot for K-12 in-school education

item.title: Infant-Robot Interaction as an Early Intervention Strategy
item.description: Our goal is to develop a socially assistive, non-contact, infant-robot interaction system to provide contingent positive feedback to increase exploration and expand early movement practice

item.title: Trust in Multi-Party Human-Robot Interaction
item.description: Building computational model of trust for human-robot interaction in group therapy setting

item.title: NAO Tutorial: Getting Started with NAO + ROS
item.description: This tutorial shows how to work with Physical NAO.

item.title: NAO Tutorial: Installation
item.description: Installing NAOqi SDK and configure NAO with ROS.

item.title: NAO Tutorial: NAOqi SDK
item.description: This tutorial shows how to use NAOqi SDK
